subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Joe Maddon, 60, has left his job as manager of the Tampa Bay Rays in a move that follows the departure of General Manager Andrew Friedman to the Los Angeles Dodgers.
snippet: Joe Maddon, 60, has left his job as manager of the Tampa Bay Rays in a move that follows the departure of General Manager Andrew Friedman to the Los Angeles Dodgers.
